string.value: Apparently, #bNina#k, a proud resident of the Mushroom Town, has a little brother...
Nina asks you to see what her brother #bSen#k wants to eat. Since Sen's inside #ba house in Mushroom Town#k, you should enter and see what he says.
Sen told you he wants some tasty #bMushroom Candy#k.
앗, 여행자님이시죠? 마침 잘 됐네요. 바쁘시지 않다면 제 부탁 하나만 들어주시겠어요? 오른쪽으로 조금만 가면 노란색 지붕의 집이 있거든요? 그 집이 바로 저희 집인데... 지금 집에는 제 동생 센이 혼자 집을 보고 있어요.
떼도 안 쓰고 혼자 집을 잘 봤으니 센에게 상을 줘야 할 텐데 뭘 줘야할지 모르겠어요. 뭔가 맛있는 거라고 주면 좋으려나...? 그러니 여행자님께서 센에게 가서 뭐가 먹고 싶은지 물어보고 돌아와 주세요.
감사합니다. 집 안으로 들어갈 때는 포탈을 탈 때와 마찬가지로 방향키↑을 누르시면 돼요.
앗, 여행이 바쁘신 모양이군요. 하지만 천천히 사람들도 사귀어 가면서 하는 여행이야말로 진짜 여행 아니겠어요? 좀 더 여유를 가져주세요.

Oh, hello traveler! Good thing you're here, I need your help! Head to the right a bit, and you'll see a #bhouse with a yellow roof#k. That's my house, and my baby brother #bSen#k is the only one inside right now.
Sen did a great job taking care of the house by himself. He deserves a reward, but I don't know what to give him. Maybe something delicious... Can you ask him what he'd like to eat?
Thanks. To enter the house, press the #bUp arrow#k on your keyboard in front of the house, just like when you use a portal.
Oh, you must be busy. Wouldn't it be fun to get to know some others, though?
You haven't talk to #bSen#k, yet? Head right and you'll see a #bhouse with a yellow roof#k. He should be inside.
